```
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

There are no existing structures to report yet.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters too close to each other
- Ensure there is enough space between inserters when placing them. The error message indicates a collision with an existing inserter. Increase the spacing, change the direction, or change the reference position to avoid this.

### Errors when connecting transport belts between inserters
- Ensure there is a valid path when connecting transport belts between inserters. The error message indicates that the path could not be normalized.

### Errors when placing entities too close to existing entities
- Ensure there is enough space when placing entities. The error message indicates a collision with an existing entity, in this case a stone furnace. Increase the spacing, change the direction, or change the reference position to avoid this.

### Errors when connecting belts directly to chests
- Belts cannot be directly connected to chests. Use an inserter to input items into the chest.

## NAMESPACE

No functions have been defined yet.
```
